segments.text: Can you tell me how to reach the bank please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which bank ? There are two , the Allied Irish Bank and the Bank of Ireland .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have an AIR pass card and I want to withdraw money from the bank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to go to the Allied Irish Bank which is near the local shopping centre , Dunned Stores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I get there . I have no knowledge of this area .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cross the road and turn left at the other side . Walk along the footpath until you reach the traffic lights . You will see a shopping centre on the right hand side . Walk across the road and turn right after the shopping centre . Keep going straight for about 100m and the bank is to your left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds very complicated . How far is it from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not so complicated . It's about five minutes walk from here . I can draw a map for you if you wish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I would really appreciate that . By the way will I be going North or South ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will be going northwards . You are now in the the Western part of the city and the Allied Irish Bank is situated in the North East . Here's a rough sketch of the area .
segments.speaker: S2
